attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently a large number of individuals signed an e-petition about the proposed vehicle tracking and road pricing policy. Today No 10 send approx 1.5 million emails to all the undersigned without request or consent. Surly the government should be setting an example to the Internet community not breaking the rules? Please STOP now and set a good example.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
